title: Galaxy Stars Pro Soccer Interactive Target Trainer
features: Target Practice anywhere you want! Indoor or Outdoor Play.
1 or 2 player mode and works with any ball
Strong, durable and lightweight mat can be hung anywhere.
description: Galaxy Stars Pro Soccer Interactive Target Trainer. The world's largest interactive playing mat that senses your every shot! With deluxe, ED graphics, LED lights and premium sound effects make you feel like you have dropped down into a proffessional soccer game! Galaxy Stars was determined to fill a void and create a real live experience of playing soccer while shooting at the games targets. We saw a lack of interactive games where players could compete and is both physical and offers a rich and immersive 3D user experience. Galaxy Stars vision is to create home entertainment gaming systems that can be easily set up and removed anywhere. Galaxy Stars designed unique scoreboards and speakers large enough to give a real stadium feel, creating games that are fun for both kids and adults. It gets them off the couch and excited to play and compete, stay active, and sharpen their skills.
